name: Vito Yask
about: Designer with 12+ years intensive experience in Interfaces design, web and app design, frontend development.

expirience.responcible: scripting, design, flow, testing, systematization, theming and branding. Content products. Voice Interfaces.
expirience.achivements: Launch and development of 3 applications on TV, SberPortal and mobile phones. Launch of commercial projects based on these applications. The Sport app received the Runet Prize 2021
